name: HotDog Out Of Control! GMTK2020
description:
Hot Dog Out Of Control

Try to not die, you have only 4 bites of life, kill all the enemys.

#GMTK 2020  #gmtk

Made by a single person in less than 48 hours

Controls

KeyBoard

Use:

  • Arrows to move
  •  or (a,s,w,d) to move
  • Z to Shoot
  • intro(enter) pausa
  • esc  get out

Touch 

  • Arrows to move
  • X  to Shoot
  • boton pause 
  • boton play

Controller

  • Arrows to move
  • Stick Analogyc left to move
  • X  to Shoot
  • start and pasue buttons

Good Luck Players!!!

Show ur best Score in the Coments...

Good Feedback!!

Thanks for playing!!!

OUT OF CONTROL!!!!
